702324f.title: Brooklyn: 4th Avenue - 17th Street
702324f.text:
(1)
Fourth Ave., west side, from and including 17th Street, to, but
not including Prospect Ave. The view also shows 17th Street,
north side, from and including Fourth Ave., to, but not including
Third Ave. This view shows the Samaritan Hospital before it
was renovated.
July 4, 1930.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
(2)
The Samaritan Hospital, viewed from another angle, showing the
hospital after it has been renovated three years later.
October 11, 1933.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.

702325f.title: Brooklyn: 4th Avenue - 17th Street
702325f.text:
Fourth Ave., west side, from and including 18th to, but not including
17th Streets. Also shown is 18th Street, north side, from and including
Fourth, to, but not including Third Aves. The view shows a frame house
at 622 Fourth Ave.
July 4, 1930.
P. L. Sperr.
NO PEPRODUCTIONS.
